short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app to track Polygon gas prices compliant with EIP-1559. Has real-time block streaming. Displays real-time price information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polygon is an amazing layer two solution that makes transactions and dapps simple and cheap. This app allows you to track gas prices and dig deeper into the blocks behind them, if only fleetingly. I compiled the app for the user to see real time block information and expand upon a regular gas tracker. The application is built using an Alchemy API and Matic-mainnet API for block information and Coingecko API for dollar price information. ** Updated badge information due to Matic network issues. Let me know if you have questions, I'd love to help if I can.
